Pre-Game Insights: Greece missed out on a spot in the European Championship after losing on penalties to Georgia in the playoffs final, prompting the exit of head coach Gus Poyet after two years at the helm.
Greece performed well in the Nations League back in 2022, picking up five wins from their six games and finishing atop their group as they secured promotion to League B.
Finland participated in the European Championship playoffs but were knocked out in the semifinals by Wales.
Finland played out a 2-2 draw against Scotland, with Benjamin Kallman and Oliver Antman netting second-half goals to secure a draw for Huuhkajat.
